content.raw: I added a brief note about a problematic case (Pgain=10, Igain=1, Dgain=0). I was not sure about writing a whole PI control section demonstrating a problematic case. My understanding is that PI control is useful in some situations, so I did not want to give the impression that it is always a problematic case.
